meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dana Murray Joe Thomas Chip Bell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6760.

td.p: Dana Murray, a foreign service officer originally from Tampa, Florida
Joe Thomas, a recent math graduate and pizza delivery person from Martin, Tennessee
Chip Bell, a telecom engineer from Marysville, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,300)

tr.td: SAFETY IN NUMBERS
CENTURY 19
10-LETTER WORDS
THEY TURNED MY BOOK INTO A MOVIE
DEATH
TAXES
